links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (12,7).
formula: a(n) = (1/86)*sqrt(43)*((6+sqrt(43))^n-(6-sqrt(43))^n). [_Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 13 2009]G.f.: x/(1 - 12*x - 7*x^2). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2012
mathematica: Join[{a=0,b=1},Table[c=12*b+7*a;a=b;b=c,{n,60}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 31 2011*)CoefficientList[Series[x/(1 - 12x - 7x^2), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{12, 7}, {0, 1}, 30] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2012 *)
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,12,-7) for n in xrange(0, 18)]# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 29 2009](MAGMA) [n le 2 select n-1 else 12*Self(n-1) + 7*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2012
